item.title: eHealth Systems, M2M Communication & Security
item.description: Paper written for Masters of Mobile Application Development 16 Aug 2016. Elizabeth H Burgess 11571039 ITC571 â€“ Innovation and Emerging Technologies Session 201660 Charles Sturt University Abstract In previous research various security issues that are of concern for Machine-to-Machine (M2M) communication in the application electronic Health (eHealth). These security concerns are not only just for eHealth; they are for all M2M communications within the domains of Smart Grids, Vehicular Networks and Smart Cars, Smart Houses, and other such networks.
